params.name: repo_id
params.description: The name of the repository you want to push your tool to. It should contain your organization name whenpushing to a given organization.

params.name: private
params.description: Whether to make the repo private. If None (default), the repo will be public unless the organizations default is private. This value is ignored if the repo already exists.

params.name: token
params.description: The token to use as HTTP bearer authorization for remote files. If unset, will use the token generatedwhen running huggingface-cli login (stored in ~/.huggingface).

params.name: create_pr
params.description: Whether or not to create a PR with the uploaded files or directly commit.
